text: Jo log apne nafs par zulm kar rahey thay unki roohein jab farishton ne qabz ki to unse pucha ke yeh tum kis haal mein mubtila thay? Unhon ne jawab diya ke hum zameen mein kamzoor o majboor thay, farishton ne kaha, kya khuda ki zameen waseeh na thi ke tum usmein hijrat karte? Yeh woh log hain jinka thikana jahannum hai aur bada hi bura thikana hai
